nav.div: Manitowoc Public School District » Coronavirus » Parent Communication

a.title: Parent Letter - March 13 School Closing Update

div.a: Parent Letter - March 13 School Closing Update

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background: white; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

p.span: The Manitowoc Public School District continues to monitor the Coronavirus situation and will contact families with updates. Below you will find correspondence to families. Thank you for your patience during this unprecedented time.

div.div:
Manitowoc Public School District
Inspiring Education. Empowering Community. Unleashing Potential.

If you cannot fully access the information on any web page of this site, please let us know the accessibility issue you are having by calling (920) 686-4777. We will try to provide the information to you in an alternative format and/or make the necessary improvements to make the information accessible.

div.span: Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. © 2020 Manitowoc Public School District
